description: A Glances dashboard for Glances + InfluxDB2

targets.query: SELECT mean("min1") FROM "load" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($my_interval) fill(null)

from(bucket: "glances")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "processcount" and
    r._field == "total" and
    r.hostname == "${host}"
  )
  |> last()
SELECT  moving_average(mean("min1"), 6) FROM "load" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT  mean("user") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter

from(bucket: "glances")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "cpu" and
    r._field == "system" and
    r.hostname == "${host}"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "system")
SELECT  mean("user") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter

from(bucket: "glances")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "fs" and
    r._field == "used" and
    r.mnt_point == "/" and 
    r.hostname == "${host}"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "used")

    r.mnt_point == "/" and 
    r.hostname == "${host}"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "size")
SELECT mean("read_bytes") FROM "diskio" WHERE ("disk_name" = 'sdb1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("read_bytes") FROM "diskio" WHERE ("disk_name" = 'sdb1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

from(bucket: "glances")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)

    r._measurement == "fs" and
    r._field == "percent" and
    r.mnt_point == "/" and 
    r.hostname == "${host}"
  )
  |> last()

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>

SELECT last("is_up") FROM "network" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$host$/ AND "interface_name" =~ /^$interface$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($my_interval) fill(null)

from(bucket: "glances")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "docker" and
    r._field == "cpu_percent" and
    r.name == "${container}" and
    r.hostname == "${host}"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "CPU%")

title: Glances
